It will be a great chance to introduce them to our services.Keep in mind that you will be doing something really good by protecting children from visiting unwanted websites, helping businesses to increase their productivity (blocking social networks and other distracting content) and much more.You can have your own schedule and choose the best time to work.What we need is to see that you are motivated and willing to manage your time.We already cooperate with such router manufacturers as Dovado, FaltCom and ZyXel  - their products are in the market with built in software module that adds support for SafeDNS filtering solution.Our current world known partners are (and not only):TELECOMS, GLOBALTranstelco, MexicoIntertelecom, UkraineKazakhtelecom, KZRostelecom, RUPaltel, PLMatanuska Telephone Association, Inc.UNIVERSITIES1) Dwight School, Canada2) Gordonstoun School, UK3)Lancaster Bible College, US, PA4) North London Grammar School, UK5) Queen of the Miraculous Medal School, USIf you are interested please send your CV to account@[url removed, login to view]
